languages.text: "Что за... гадкие оттенки..." {n}Леди-Навигатор отшатывается, прикрывая ладонью рот.{/n} "Цвета этого места прогнили насквозь. А эти люди... их оттенки сочатся безумием и отчаянием, болью и обреченностью..."

"Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."
languages.original_text: "Что за... гадкие оттенки..." {n}Леди-Навигатор отшатывается, прикрывая ладонью рот.{/n} "Цвета этого места прогнили насквозь. А эти люди... их оттенки сочатся безумием и отчаянием, болью и обреченностью..."

"Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."

languages.text: "Welch .. fürchterliche Schatten ..." {n}Cassia weicht zurück und bedeckt ihren Mund.{/n} "Die Farben dieses Ortes sind faul bis ins Mark. Und diese Leute ... ihre Farben künden lautstark von Wahnsinn und Verzweiflung, von Schmerz und Untergang ..."
languages.original_text: "Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."

traits.locale_text: "Welch .. fürchterliche Schatten ..." {n}Cassia weicht zurück und bedeckt ihren Mund.{/n} "Die Farben dieses Ortes sind faul bis ins Mark. Und diese Leute ... ihre Farben künden lautstark von Wahnsinn und Verzweiflung, von Schmerz und Untergang ..."

languages.text: {n}Cassia fait un pas en arrière en portant la main à sa bouche.{/n} « Des teintes... effroyables... Les couleurs de cet endroit sont pourries jusqu'à la moelle, et celles des gens... Elles dégoulinent de démence et de désespoir, de souffrance et de malheur... »
languages.original_text: "Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia fait un pas en arrière en portant la main à sa bouche.{/n} « Des teintes... effroyables... Les couleurs de cet endroit sont pourries jusqu'à la moelle, et celles des gens... Elles dégoulinent de démence et de désespoir, de souffrance et de malheur... »

languages.text: “如此……可怕的影子……”{n}卡西娅退了一步，捂住了嘴。{/n}“这个地方的颜色已经烂到了根上。至于这些人……他们的颜色渗透着疯狂、绝望、痛苦与死亡……”
languages.original_text: "Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."

traits.locale_text: “如此……可怕的影子……”{n}卡西娅退了一步，捂住了嘴。{/n}“这个地方的颜色已经烂到了根上。至于这些人……他们的颜色渗透着疯狂、绝望、痛苦与死亡……”

languages.text: 「何て…恐ろしい色…」{n}カシアは後ずさり、口を覆う。{/n}「この場所の色は、芯まで腐りきっています。それにこの者たちは…彼らの色は狂気と絶望、痛みと破滅に溢れています…」
languages.original_text: "Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."

traits.locale_text: 「何て…恐ろしい色…」{n}カシアは後ずさり、口を覆おう。{/n}「この場所の色は、芯まで腐りきっています。それにこの人たちは…彼らの色は狂気と絶望、痛みと破滅に覆われて…」
「何て…恐ろしい色…」{n}カシアは後ずさり、口を覆う。{/n}「この場所の色は、芯まで腐りきっています。それにこの者たちは…彼らの色は狂気と絶望、痛みと破滅に溢れています…」

languages.text: «Qué tonos más... espantosos...». {n}Cassia retrocede y se cubre la boca.{/n} «Los colores de este lugar están completamente putrefactos. Y esta gente... su color denota locura y desesperación, dolor y fatalidad...».
languages.original_text: "Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."

traits.locale_text: «Qué tonos más... espantosos...». {n}Cassia retrocede y se cubre la boca.{/n} «Los colores de este lugar están completamente putrefactos. Y esta gente... su color denota locura y desesperación, dolor y fatalidad...».

languages.text: "Böylesi... Korkunç gölgeler..." {n}Cassia geri çekilip ağzını kapatıyor.{/n} "Bu yerin renkleri tümüyle çürümüş. Bu insanlar... Renklerinden delilik, umutsuzluk, acı ve kıyamet sızıyor."
languages.original_text: "Such... dreadful shades..." {n}Cassia recoils and covers her mouth.{/n} "The colours of this place, they are putrescent to the core. And these people... their colours are oozing with madness and despair, pain, and doom..."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi... Korkunç gölgeler..." {n}Cassia geri çekilip ağzını kapatıyor.{/n} "Bu yerin renkleri tümüyle çürümüş. Bu insanlar... Renklerinden delilik, umutsuzluk, acı ve kıyamet sızıyor."
